name: Absolute RC Boat Sim
description: Professional RC Boat simulator. Drive fast RC boats right on your phone or tablet. This is probably the most advanced and true to life boat simulation available today!  We have provided different type of boats that vary in speed and handling characteristics. Initially we provide Mono, Cat, Rigger boat types and will add Hydro type boats soon. This app is great for ages 8 to 80+ and will delight you, so please download now!
